item.title: Report E-2023090383
item.description:
Report E-2023090383

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: GREENCASTLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of concrete cleaner (un1760) damaging one of the inner one gallon poly jug and releasing 1 pint of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report E-2023090380
item.description:
Report E-2023090380

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: NORTH HUNTINGDON
  • State: PA

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: xpo logistics
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the metal 55 gallon drum of polyester resin (un1866) had been punctured by a sharp object and had released 25 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.description:

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found the damaged hazmat in QA in a tote upside down. I had to put on all of the proper PPE to protect myself from the loose liquid from the bottom of the tote. I turn the box upright and began my damaged hazmat procedure. DescribePack: The cap was loose. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: It was turn upright and moved into a drum.

item.title: Report X-2023081170
item.description:
Report X-2023081170

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: FAIRVIEW
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box had come down the rollers and looked like it needed to be taped. Upon moving to tape package noticed a small wet spot on the bottom. Package placed in a leaker bin to contain liquid spillage. DescribePack: The package had a small wet spot on the bottom of the package. Contents packagaed in individual plastic bags with cardboard divider at the top. One jug of Sizzle was dented and had a loose cap. A small amount of liquid had spilled inside bag and leaked on inside of box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a leaker bin to contain spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023080996
item.description:
Report X-2023080996

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T15:12:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: HORSHAM
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 10 POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING 10 X 5 ML VIALS OF EXOVEX REVIVE 5B. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX IS A ULINE INSULATED SHIPPER PREPRINTED RUSH, PERISHABLE, INSULATED AND UP ARROWS. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2023081063
item.description:
Report X-2023081063

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-07
  • City: WEST CHESTER
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING, PROGRESS OF PACKAGE WAS STOPPED, AND A RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO REMOVE PACKAGE TO DMP CAGE. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat was found on the dock leaking. The box was closed, but a white color liquid was leaking from the bottom of the box. The hazmat was put into a bin to stop the spreading and place in the damage hazmat cage. The box was opened and inside there was a open paint can. DescribePack: The lid on the paint can inside the box, came off causing the paint to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed into a bin and put into the damage hazmat cage.
